#define TIMESPEC_TO_TIMEVAL (   ts,
  tv 
)
Value:
do                                                                                      \
{                                                                                       \
        (tv)->tv_sec = (ts)->tv_sec;                    \
    (tv)->tv_usec = (ts)->tv_nsec / 1000;       \
} while(0)

#define TIMEVAL_TO_TIMESPEC (   tv,
  ts 
)
Value:
do                                                                                      \
{                                                                                       \
        (ts)->tv_sec = (tv)->tv_sec;                    \
    (ts)->tv_nsec = (tv)->tv_usec * 1000;       \
} while(0)
